messages.text: I'm truly sorry for my mistakes. I promise to work on myself and our relationship.
Every day is a new opportunity to show you how much you mean to me.
I understand if you need time, but I'm here, ready to make things right.
Your support means everything to me. Together, we can overcome anything.
I love you more than words can express, and I'm committed to proving it.

title: A sincere apology
message: I was wrong. I cheated and hurt you. I'm committed to changing and earning your trust every day.
